title: These hospitals face major flood risk. Experts say Trump is making it worse.
description: Hospitals across the U.S. are at risk of significant flooding, and climate experts warn that the Trump administration's cuts leave the nation less prepared.
content:
LOUISVILLE, Tenn. — When a big storm hits, Peninsula Hospital could be underwater.

title: At Least 170 US Hospitals Face Major Flood Risk. Experts Say Trump Is Making It Worse.
description: As a warming climate intensifies storms, KFF Health News has identified more than 170 U.S. hospitals at risk of significant and potentially dangerous flooding. Climate experts warn that the Trump administration’s cuts leave the nation less prepared.

title: At least 47 killed in Nepal as heavy rains trigger landslides, flash floods
description: Heavy rains continue to disrupt rescue operations in Himalayan nation as authorities struggle to respond to the crisis.
content:
Landslides and flash floods, triggered by heavy rains, have killed at least 47 people, blocked roads and washed away bridges in Nepal.
